title: Projects
body: These are some of the projects Iâ€™m currently working on or exploring. They reflect my focus on learning, building useful tools, and experimenting with new ideas in web development and AI.

projects.title: Personal Blog
projects.description: A modern blog built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features MDX support, dark mode, and responsive design.

projects.title: AI Prompting Playground
projects.description: An interactive playground to experiment with AI prompting techniques using local and cloud models. Used to refine personal prompting workflows.

projects.title: Tattoo Flash Organizer
projects.description: A web tool to organize, resize, and prepare tattoo flash sheets for conventions. Built for practical use by tattoo artists with client-side image resizing and layout.

projects.title: Offline AI Agent Tools
projects.description: A collection of experiments with running and integrating local LLMs, including embeddings, vector search, and JSON workflows.
